summary: This document is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to AT&T Legal Compliance, seeking telephone records for the period January 1, 2002 through December 31, 2006, as part of a criminal investigation into violations of federal sex trafficking and related statutes. It includes a cover letter requesting non-disclosure and a declaration form for the custodian of records.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena and signed the cover letter requesting non-disclosure of the subpoena to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Signed the subpoena and is the point of contact for the subpoena compliance and any disclosure of its existence.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date
events.description: The date by which AT&T is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury or produce the requested records.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The date the grand jury subpoena was issued to AT&T Legal Compliance.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
AT&T Legal Compliance, 11760 Highway 1, Suite 600, North Palm Beach, FL 33408
United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an official criminal investigation into suspected felony violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 1594(c) (attempt/conspiracy to commit sex trafficking), and 2422(b) (coercion/enticement for illegal sexual activity).
The investigation was active and confidential as of June 2019, with the U.S. Attorney's Office requesting AT&T not disclose the subpoena's existence to any third party.
The subpoena seeks all records for specific telephone numbers for a five-year period from January 1, 2002, through December 31, 2006.
The specific telephone numbers targeted by the subpoena are listed in the rider but are redacted in the provided text.
